name: DmiMag FAQs
author: dmimag

sections.description:
DmiMag FAQs is a lightweight WordPress FAQ Plugin.
Create an unlimited number of FAQs or Docs (guides) that easily fit into your website design.

FAQ Demo

Key Features

  • Unlimited number of FAQs or Docs (guides)
  • WYSIWYG editor use
  • Automatically generated shortcodes
  • Easy to integrate into website design
  • FAQ Question sorting
  • Schema.org (https://schema.org/FAQPage) support
sections.installation:
1. Upload dmimag-faqs.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create first FAQ
  4. Place shortcode in your post or page
sections.changelog:
1.2.6

  • Changed the way the plugin styles and scripts are displayed. CSS and JS are only displayed when using the plugin shortcode. Minify CSS and JS
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.2.5

  • Add Schema.org/FAQPage
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.2.4

  • Fixing a bug with displaying a button “+ Add FAQ”

1.2.3

  • Fixed minor bugs

1.2.2

  • Fixed minor bugs

1.2.1

  • Add Sanitized, Escaped and Validated Data
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.2.0

  • Added the ability to sort FAQ
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.1.2

  • Stable version

1.0

Initial release.
